original_title: À la découverte de l'Aïd al-Adha
overview: The Aid al-Adha is the largest annual Muslim religous holiday observed around the world. But do we really know its origins and its spiritual significance? From fantasies to word of mouth, controversy and false accusations, Farid DMS Debah leads us on the discovery of this holiday through an intiatory journey and educational narrative. Far from negative stereotypes this documentary reveals the reality of Aid al-Adha both a religous holiday and societal phenomenon.
title: Let's Discover Eid al-Adha
